tooltip.lieutenant.fill: §7Fills area between selected points with block in §6off-hand§7. If there is none, the area is §6cleared§7.
tooltip.lieutenant.clone: §7Select an area to copy, then %s to paste the blocks.
tooltip.lieutenant.select: §7Use %s§7 to select two locations. %s§7 to select the §6targeted block§7, otherwise selects the block's side
